examples: Please focus on your studies and not on your hobbies
The Russian government centralized the distribution of food
condense the contents of a book into a summary

definitions.text: draw together or meet in one common center
examples: These groups concentrate in the inner cities
Congress condensed the three-year plan into a six-month plan

definitions.text: be cooked until very little liquid is left
examples: The sauce should reduce to one cup

definitions.text: cook until very little liquid is left
examples: The cook reduced the sauce by boiling it for a long time

definitions.text: gathered together or made less diffuse
examples: a narrow thread of concentrated ore

definitions.text: of or relating to a solution whose dilution has been reduced

examples: her concentrated passion held them at bay

definitions.text: (of light) transmitted directly from a pointed light source
being the most concentrated solution possible at a given temperature; unable to dissolve still more of a substance
